itemDescription: Bishop of Fulham; Bishop of Peterborough; Bishop of London; Bishop of Jerusalem; Bishop of Bermuda

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Wright Stopford,  (20 February 1901 – 13 August 1976) was a British Anglican bishop.

response: * Robert Stopford (1901-1976), briefly Bishop of Fulham, before becoming Bishop of London, the last to reside at Fulham Palace
